title: Fall
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 51 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: Fall describes a season of colorful transformations. Pumpkins, apples, leaves, corn, the frosty ground, and even the moon change color as winter approaches. A delightful scarecrow introduces students to these color transformations in an easy-to-read format.
reviewWords: corn, frost, grass, leaves, moon, pumpkins
phonics: Consonants : Associate the letter Tt with the sound /t/
